/>
VIII.iv.3.C.4.b
.
Handling Claims Requiring Compensation Service Approval
Submit any claim to Compensation Service for extra-schedular IU consideration if the schedular requirements of
38 CFR 4.16(a)
are not met but the evidence of record supports a finding that the Veteran is unemployable by reason of an SC disability(ies).
Reference
:  For more information on submitting compensation claims for extra-schedular consideration, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 3.D.3
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
